configuration.description: Configuration information for your Amazon Kendra experience. The provider will only perform drift detection of its value when present in a configuration. Detailed below.

description.description: A description for your Amazon Kendra experience.

endpoints.description: Shows the endpoint URLs for your Amazon Kendra experiences. The URLs are unique and fully hosted by AWS.

experienceId.description: The unique identifier of the experience.

indexId.description: The identifier of the index for your Amazon Kendra experience.

name.description: A name for your Amazon Kendra experience.

roleArn.description:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a role with permission to access `Query API`, `QuerySuggestions API`, `SubmitFeedback API`, and `AWS SSO` that stores your user and group information. For more information, see [IAM roles for Amazon Kendra](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/kendra/latest/dg/iam-roles.html).

The following arguments are optional:

status.description: The current processing status of your Amazon Kendra experience.

configuration.description: Configuration information for your Amazon Kendra experience. The provider will only perform drift detection of its value when present in a configuration. Detailed below.

description.description: A description for your Amazon Kendra experience.

indexId.description: The identifier of the index for your Amazon Kendra experience.

name.description: A name for your Amazon Kendra experience.

roleArn.description:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a role with permission to access `Query API`, `QuerySuggestions API`, `SubmitFeedback API`, and `AWS SSO` that stores your user and group information. For more information, see [IAM roles for Amazon Kendra](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/kendra/latest/dg/iam-roles.html).

The following arguments are optional:

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Experience resources.
